problem.choiceresponse:
Which of the following commands can be used to get a single message from a stream? Assume that we know the message's ID.Choose two answers:
XGET
XLEN
XRANGE
XREVRANGE
Explanation
To get a single message, use XRANGE or XREVRANGE, specifying the desired message ID as both the upper and lower bound of the range. There is no singular XGET command.
